relatedBlades.title: Regain control of AI crawlers
relatedBlades.copy: AI training crawlers and malicious bots pose serious security threats and chip away at revenue. Security leaders must address these threats head on —  while still capitalizing on "good" bot activity.

features.title: Safeguarding critical infrastructure organizations
features.description: Cybercriminals and nation-states are stepping up attacks on critical infrastructure in the US, threatening to cause economic harm and serious repercussions for millions

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Threat Landscape - Safeguarding critical infrastructure organizations - Image

features.title: Reimagining cyber resilience
features.description: It's time to build a new strategy for maintaining business continuity in the face of emerging AI threats, third-party risks, and shifting regulations

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Threat Landscape - Reimagining cyber resilience - Hero Image

features.title: Combating AI-powered threats
features.description: Organizations need AI to defeat AI. CIO, Mike Hamilton shares 7 ways to strengthen security for AI-based threats

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Combating AI-powered threats - Image

features.title: Impersonation is fooling the enterprise
features.description: Name impersonation attacks are evolving — 3 real-life examples of this threat that organizations are struggling to mitigate

features.title: The ripple effect of compromised credentials
features.description: 44% of employees use the same credentials for personal and work accounts — once exposed, the vulnerability is shared with their organization

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Threat Landscape - The ripple effect of compromised credentials - Image

features.title: Scaling up DDoS defenses
features.description: DDoS attacks are becoming larger, more prevalent, more sophisticated and have out smarted legacy prevention — traditional defenses can't keep up

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Threat Landscape - Scaling up DDoS defenses - Image

features.title: Multi-cloud compliance in a multi-jurisdictional world
features.description: Gartner reports that 99% of compromised data will result from cloud misconfigurations and account breaches. Here's how leaders can ensure data compliance across multiple clouds and jurisdictions

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Threat Landscape - Multi-cloud compliance in a multi-jurisdictional world- Image

features.title: 74% of organizations are now API-first
features.description: The vast majority of developers today use application programming interfaces (APIs) to accelerate software innovation — but doing so has created new security risks for their organizations

imageAssetFile.title: 74% of organizations are now API-first

features.title: Four Internet trends to watch
features.description: Data shows that organizations need to address long-standing vulnerabilities as well as shifting tactics. Cloudflare's head of data insight, David Belson, highlights key security and Internet trends, and shares recommendations for critical threats

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Threat Landscape - Four Internet trends from 2024 to watch - Image

features.title: Your first line of defense in cyber security
features.description: Cyber attacks due to human error are on the rise — making a security-first culture more critical than ever

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Your first line of defense in cyber security - Image

features.title: Financial services organizations are more targeted than ever
features.description: The financial services industry experienced the most data breaches of any industry in 2023 — and there have been several notable bank breaches in 2024

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Financial services organizations are more targeted than ever - Threat Landscape - Image

features.title: Evaluating readiness for a new cyber security landscape
features.description: Three key trends from the 2024 Asia Pacific cyber readiness survey — Organizations will need to act quickly to prepare for these latest threats

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Threat Landscape - Evaluating readiness for a new cyber security landscape - Image

features.title: The API imperative: Safeguarding digital lifelines
features.description: APIs are central for how apps and websites work today — and as a result, they have become prime targets for attackers

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Threat Landscape - The API imperative: Safeguarding digital lifelines - Image

features.title: Cloud implications on business security
features.description: An upsurge in DDoS attacks, the expansion of hybrid work, and a rise in hacktivism related to geopolitical conflicts are forcing organizations to strengthen cloud security. Organizations should recalibrate strategies now to stay ahead

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Cloud implications on business security - Threat Landscape - Image

features.title: State of application security
features.description: Web applications are rarely built with security in mind. Yet, we use them daily for all sorts of critical functions, making them a rich target for hackers — here are 3 emerging trends requiring urgent attention from CISOs

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Threat Landscape - State of application security - Image

features.title: Securing the future: Cyber security readiness report
features.description: This 10-part series for CISOs looking to secure the future and achieve better outcomes for their organization breaks down survey results from over 4,000 cyber security professionals and uncovers new findings on security incidents and preparedness

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Threat Landscape - Securing the future: Cyber security readiness report - Image

features.title: Three emerging security trends
features.description: Security programs face constant expansion while tasked with protecting an evolving attack surface, especially as organizations rush to build and deploy internal AI models — Here are 3 emerging trends requiring immediate attention from CISOs

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Threat Landscape - Three emerging security trends - Image

features.title: Client-side attacks are mounting
features.description: Two new PCI compliance requirements aim to secure client-side environments and protect customers who are being exploited by supply chain attacks

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Threat Landscape - Client-side attacks are mounting - Image

features.title: Malware disguised as developer tools
features.description:
Attackers are finding more effective ways to infiltrate organizations, developer systems being the latest
target — three signs of common scams and the strategies to spot and stop them

features.title: Are OSS attacks avoidable?
features.description: Open source software attacks are preventable, but not prevented — 4 tips to minimize OSS risk and reduce the likelihood of attack

features.title: The next era of DDoS attacks
features.description: The HTTP/2 'Rapid Reset' attack leaves the majority of web applications and servers vulnerable with over 62% of all Internet traffic using the HTTP/2 protocol

features.title: Phishing attacks leveraging legitimate services
